controller

Class LoadSaveController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SerializationController
      • controller.LoadSaveController

  • public class LoadSaveController
extends SerializationController
    Controller for loading and saving the program data in a save file

    The save format is a `.zip` file with 3 entries: 1. A Metadata/Magic word entry. Handles password validating by checking if the magic word matches after decryption and contains the master password metadata 2. A Password database entry. Stores the list of managed passwords in the same CSV format as ImportExportController 3. A Tag database entry. Store a list of all tags, even those that aren't associated with any entries. Each tag is stored on its own line and in the same format as in the same list per entry.

    De-/Encryption is done using standard AES. Each entry of the `.zip` file will be encrypted individually, the file as a whole will not be encrypted

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void load(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Loads the password/tag database stored at the given file into SerializationController.pmController If the current PMController already contains entries and tags, the loaded data will be merged with the existing data
      void save(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Saves the password/tag database from SerializationController.pmController to the given file
